meanings.sent1: The poltroon ran away at the first sign of danger.
meanings.sent2: Don't be a poltroon; face your fears and stand up for yourself.
meanings.sent3: The poltroon's fear of spiders was so extreme, they screamed at the sight of a tiny one.
meanings.sent4: His reputation as a poltroon spread through the town like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The image of the poltroon trembling in fear will forever be etched in my memory.

meanings.sent3: The poltroon's lack of bravery was both sad and frustrating to witness.
meanings.sent4: His actions painted him as a poltroon in the eyes of all who knew him.
meanings.sent5: The poltroon's selfishness knew no bounds, even in the face of danger.

meanings.sent3: The poltroon's cowardly behavior was a stain on his otherwise respectable reputation.
